Text:
Wow, what happened with seed0? I had already downloaded it from him a few months ago, I think. Pretty suspicious, why did he disappear...?

Oh, for those who haven't seen this before, the quality of the DVD is outstanding.

To Brownd: Yes, seed0, aka M.T.Reznor,  is still here on TPB, but he hasn't uploaded anything since 2006. 
I uploaded this to make it more widely available to anyone who might not know about the original seed0 upload.
"It took you to make me realize, it took you to make me see the light..."
